content.raw:
Fixed in 9e52ea5. I updated the Python script in private repo too.

The bug is illustrated in the image below. The edges between 4-17, 6-19, shouldn’t be there. These are the tiles to each side of the Platform tiles, in the part where the two Platform tiles are next to each other. The Straight Door tiles shouldn’t be connected.

‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3263377380-Screenshot_from_2019-10-25_20-22-10.png)
‌
content.html:
Fixed in 9e52ea5. I updated the Python script in private repo too.

The bug is illustrated in the image below. The edges between 4-17, 6-19, shouldn’t be there. These are the tiles to each side of the Platform tiles, in the part where the two Platform tiles are next to each other. The Straight Door tiles shouldn’t be connected.
